blocked.short_desc: CVE-2024-45337 golang.org/x/crypto/ssh: Misuse of ServerConfig.PublicKeyCallback may cause authorization bypass in golang.org/x/crypto

long_desc.thetext: Applications and libraries which misuse the ServerConfig.PublicKeyCallback callback may be susceptible to an authorization bypass.

bugs.title: CVE-2024-45338 gh: Non-linear parsing of case-insensitive content in golang.org/x/net/html [fedora-40]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2024-45338 gh: Non-linear parsing of case-insensitive content in golang.org/x/net/html [fedora-40]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2024-45338 golang.org/x/net/html: Non-linear parsing of case-insensitive content in golang.org/x/net/html

long_desc.thetext: An attacker can craft an input to the Parse functions that would be processed non-linearly with respect to its length, resulting in extremely slow parsing. This could cause a denial of service.
